Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__13.18__Sew cushions: : Viz., by making people easy in their sins, and promising them impunity.-- Ibid.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__13.18__They gave life to their souls: : That is, they flattered them with promises of life, peace, and security.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__13.19__Violated me: : That is, dishonoured and discredited me. Ibid.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__13.19__To kill souls: : That is, to sentence souls to death, which are not to die; and to promise life to them who are not to live.
